abilities.description: You have an affinity for the depths. You can spend extended time underwater without need of a breath, and have 5 air. When you exert yourself to make a move underwater, you may suffer -1 air and add +1. When your air is 0, you must @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.905205c073b09eac]{Endure Harm} (-2) before making any move involving physical action. When you return to the surface or an air-filled environment, set your air to 5.

Once per foray into underwater environs, you may trade air for momentum, or vice-versa. Suffer -2 air and take +2 momentum, or @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.93d2d69b7e2b85e1]{Lose Momentum} (-2) and take +2 air.
When you make a move to maneuver while diving or swimming, take +1 momentum on a strong hit.
